minor_max_mana_5.title: Mana Initiate
minor_max_mana_5.description: Begin your magical journey with a small increase to your arcane reserves. Gain 5 points of maximum mana, allowing for slightly more spell casting before depletion.

minor_mana_regen_1.title: Arcane Trickle
minor_mana_regen_1.description: Learn to attune yourself to the ambient magical energies around you. Increase mana regeneration by 1 point, slightly hastening your recovery between spellcasting.

minor_cooldown_reduction_1.title: Arcane Efficiency
minor_cooldown_reduction_1.description: Discover the fundamentals of spell weaving efficiency, reducing spell cooldowns by 1%. This small improvement allows you to cast your favorite spells marginally more often.

minor_spell_power_1.title: Arcane Spark
minor_spell_power_1.description: Channel magical energy with slightly improved focus, increasing spell power by 1%. Your spells now have just a bit more punch behind them.

major_knockback_resistance_30.title: Immovable Stance
major_knockback_resistance_30.description: Master the art of anchoring your body with magical energy, gaining 30% knockback resistance. Stand your ground against powerful attacks that would send others flying.

medium_knockback_resistance_10.title: Grounding Force
medium_knockback_resistance_10.description: Learn to root yourself with magical energy, gaining 10% knockback resistance. Feel significantly more stable when facing enemies with powerful attacks.

medium_magic_protection_10.title: Arcane Shield
medium_magic_protection_10.description: Weave protective enchantments around yourself, gaining 10 points of magic protection. Magical attacks now find it more difficult to penetrate your enhanced defenses.

minor_summon_damage_1.title: Minion's Fury
minor_summon_damage_1.description: Begin learning the art of empowering your summoned creatures, increasing their damage by 1%. Your minions strike with slightly more force than before.

spectral_sight+5.title: Veil Piercing Perception
spectral_sight+5.description: Develop the ability to perceive beyond mortal limitations, gaining 5 points of spectral sight. Glimpse entities through walls and see into the ethereal planes that overlay our reality.

ghost_health+5.title: Ethereal Protection
ghost_health+5.description: Manifest a shield of spectral energy around your form, gaining 5 points of ghost health. This ethereal barrier absorbs damage before your physical body is harmed.

magic_protection+5.title: Mystic Barrier
magic_protection+5.description: Weave protective enchantments into your very essence, gaining 5 points of magic protection. Arcane defenses shield your body and soul from magical harm of all kinds.

overheal.title: Life Essence Overflow
overheal.description: Your body can temporarily sustain more life energy than normal, allowing healing to exceed your maximum health by 5%. This excess vitality gradually fades over time but provides crucial protection in dangerous situations.

healing_received.title: Vitality Amplification
healing_received.description: Your body resonates with life-giving energies, increasing healing received by 10%. Potions, regeneration effects, and other healing sources restore significantly more health, making recovery far more efficient.

nametag_distance.title: Eagle-Eyed Recognition
nametag_distance.description: Your vision sharpens to supernatural clarity, increasing nametag visibility distance by 10 blocks. Identify friends and foes from remarkable distances, gaining critical tactical information before engagement.

mob_detection_range.title: Shadow Walker's Stealth
mob_detection_range.description: Move like a ghost through the wilderness, reducing hostile mob detection range by 20%. Creatures sense your presence only when you draw much closer, allowing for stealthy approaches and safer exploration.

phase.title: Ethereal Existence
phase.description: Your physical form occasionally slips between dimensions, gaining 20% phasing ability. Parts of your body can momentarily exist slightly out of phase with normal reality, allowing limited movement through solid objects.

health+2.title: Heartbound Fortitude
health+2.description: Channel inner strength to permanently increase maximum health by 1 heart, allowing you to endure greater challenges.

health+4.title: Warrior's Resilience
health+4.description: Harness battle-hardened vitality to increase maximum health by 2 hearts, significantly improving your survival in dangerous encounters.

max_mana+50.title: Azure Wellspring Expansion
max_mana+50.description: Widen your arcane channels to increase maximum mana by 50 points, supporting more powerful and frequent spell casting.

mana_regen+10.title: Mystic Aether Flow
mana_regen+10.description: Tune your body to the magical currents of the world, increasing mana regeneration by 10 points to recover faster between spellcasting.

cooldown_reduction+5%.title: Chronomancer's Acceleration
cooldown_reduction+5%.description: Bend time to your will, reducing spell cooldowns by 5% to cast powerful spells more frequently.

spell_power+5%.title: Arcane Amplification
spell_power+5%.description: Focus magical energies more effectively, increasing spell power by 5% to enhance all magical effects and damage.

magic_specialization.title: Archmage's Forbidden Knowledge
magic_specialization.description: Unlock the deepest arcane secrets, gaining 20 max mana and 20% spell power to unleash magical devastation upon your enemies.

minor_armor.title: Hardened Skin
minor_armor.description: Toughen your skin to gain +0.5 armor points, providing a small but helpful defense against physical attacks.

medium_armor.title: Iron Flesh Barrier
medium_armor.description: Develop resilient flesh that grants +1 armor point, noticeably reducing damage from enemy attacks.

minor_knockback_res.title: Steadfast Footing
minor_knockback_res.description: Plant your feet firmly to gain 3% knockback resistance, making you harder to displace in combat.

medium_knockback_res.title: Mountain's Stance
medium_knockback_res.description: Become as immovable as a mountain with 5% knockback resistance, better withstanding powerful attacks.

medium_movement_speed.title: Fleet-Footed
medium_movement_speed.description: Master movement techniques to increase your speed by 3%, allowing for faster travel and combat positioning.

minor_max_mana.title: Arcane Reservoir
minor_max_mana.description: Expand your inner magical reserves to gain 5 additional maximum mana, allowing for more spell casting.

medium_max_mana.title: Mystic Wellspring
medium_max_mana.description: Significantly expand your magical capacity to gain 10 additional maximum mana for extended spellcasting.

major_max_mana.title: Archmage's Reservoir
major_max_mana.description: Master the art of mana storage to gain 20 additional maximum mana, enabling the casting of powerful spell combinations.

minor_mana_regen.title: Mana Flow
minor_mana_regen.description: Attune yourself to magical energies, increasing mana regeneration by 5 to recover faster after spellcasting.

medium_mana_regen.title: Arcane Current
medium_mana_regen.description: Channel magical energies more efficiently to increase mana regeneration by 8, greatly reducing recovery time between spells.

minor_cooldown_reduction.title: Spell Efficiency
minor_cooldown_reduction.description: Learn to weave spells more efficiently, reducing cooldowns by 2% to cast more frequently.

medium_cooldown_reduction.title: Arcane Acceleration
medium_cooldown_reduction.description: Master spell recovery techniques to reduce cooldowns by 4%, allowing significantly faster reuse of powerful spells.

minor_spell_power.title: Arcane Focus
minor_spell_power.description: Learn to focus magical energies more effectively, increasing spell power by 2% for greater magical impact.

medium_spell_power.title: Potent Casting
medium_spell_power.description: Master magical channeling to increase spell power by 4%, significantly enhancing all spell effects.

minor_cast_time_reduction.title: Swift Incantation
minor_cast_time_reduction.description: Perfect your spellcasting technique to reduce casting time by 3%, allowing faster spell execution.

fire_spell_power.title: Pyromancer's Flame
fire_spell_power.description: Attune yourself to fire magic, increasing fire spell power by 5% for more devastating flame-based attacks.

ice_spell_power.title: Cryomancer's Frost
ice_spell_power.description: Harness the power of cold to increase ice spell power by 5%, enhancing all frost-based magic.

lightning_spell_power.title: Stormcaller's Surge
lightning_spell_power.description: Channel the power of storms to increase lightning spell power by 5%, electrifying your magical arsenal.

holy_spell_power.title: Divine Channeler
holy_spell_power.description: Connect with divine energies to increase holy spell power by 5%, strengthening healing and sacred magics.

ender_spell_power.title: Void Walker
ender_spell_power.description: Attune yourself to the End's energies to increase ender spell power by 5%, enhancing teleportation and void magic.

blood_spell_power.title: Crimson Ritualist
blood_spell_power.description: Master the forbidden art of blood magic to increase blood spell power by 5%, enhancing life-force manipulation.

evocation_spell_power.title: Summoner's Will
evocation_spell_power.description: Strengthen your command over summoned entities, increasing evocation spell power by 5%.

nature_spell_power.title: Druidic Connection
nature_spell_power.description: Attune yourself to natural energies to increase nature spell power by 5%, enhancing plant and earth magic.

ars_mana_discount.title: Efficient Spellcraft
ars_mana_discount.description: Master magical efficiency to reduce Ars Nouveau spell mana cost by 2%, allowing more spells with the same mana.

absorption_boost.title: Golden Heart Enchantment
absorption_boost.description: Ancient protective magics flow through your veins, increasing maximum absorption by 2 hearts. Your body can now maintain more powerful magical shields, creating golden hearts that absorb damage before your life force.

magic_protection.title: Arcane Ward Enchantment
magic_protection.description: Protective sigils manifest across your skin, granting 5 points of magic protection. Hostile spells and magical damage are partially absorbed by these mystical wards, leaving you less vulnerable to arcane attacks.

ars_saturation.title: Arcane Nourishment
ars_saturation.description: The magical energies flowing through you now sustain your physical form, providing 5 points of magical saturation. Casting spells occasionally fills your hunger bar, converting raw arcane power into bodily nourishment.

ars_feather.title: Zephyr's Divine Grace
ars_feather.description: While channeling arcane energies, air itself cushions your falls. When actively casting spells, you descend as gently as a feather, never taking damage from even the highest drops as magic buoys your descent.

eldritch_spell_power.title: Forbidden Knowledge Wielder
eldritch_spell_power.description: Your mind has glimpsed beyond the veil of reality, increasing eldritch spell power by 5%. Channel cosmic forces with greater potency as your understanding of impossible geometries grows deeper.

summon_damage.title: Conjurer's Empowerment
summon_damage.description: The creatures you conjure manifest with greater ferocity, dealing 5% more damage. Your summoned allies strike with supernatural precision and power, tearing through enemies with enhanced fury.

minor_fire_spell_power.title: Ember Spark
minor_fire_spell_power.description: Begin channeling heat energy into your spellcasting, increasing fire spell power by 1%. The first step toward pyromancy mastery.

major_fire_spell_power.title: Infernal Mastery
major_fire_spell_power.description: Your control over flames reaches new heights, increasing fire spell power by 7%. Enemies cower before your devastating infernos.

minor_ice_spell_power.title: Winter's Touch
minor_ice_spell_power.description: Learn to channel the slightest chill into your magic, increasing ice spell power by 1%. Feel the first whispers of winter at your fingertips.

major_ice_spell_power.title: Glacial Dominion
major_ice_spell_power.description: Become one with the eternal frost, increasing ice spell power by 7%. Your devastating cold spells can freeze even the most resilient foes.

minor_lightning_spell_power.title: Static Surge
minor_lightning_spell_power.description: Channel the tiniest sparks of electrical energy, increasing lightning spell power by 1%. The first crackle of power courses through your spells.

major_lightning_spell_power.title: Thunderlord's Wrath
major_lightning_spell_power.description: Harness the raw power of storms and fury, increasing lightning spell power by 7%. The sky itself answers your call with devastating electrical force.

minor_holy_spell_power.title: Divine Favor
minor_holy_spell_power.description: Receive the faintest blessing of divine power, increasing holy spell power by 1%. Your first tentative connection to sacred energies has been established.

major_holy_spell_power.title: Celestial Blessing
major_holy_spell_power.description: Become a true vessel for divine power, increasing holy spell power by 7%. Your healing magic and sacred spells shine with extraordinary radiance.

minor_ender_spell_power.title: Void Whisper
minor_ender_spell_power.description: Begin to hear the faint whispers of the void, increasing ender spell power by 1%. Your first tenuous connection to End energies has formed.

major_ender_spell_power.title: Dimensional Sovereign
major_ender_spell_power.description: Master the eldritch forces of the End, increasing ender spell power by 7%. The boundaries between dimensions bend to your will.

minor_blood_spell_power.title: Blood Droplet
minor_blood_spell_power.description: Learn the most basic techniques of hemomancy, increasing blood spell power by 1%. You begin to understand how life essence can fuel your magic.

major_blood_spell_power.title: Crimson Archmagus
major_blood_spell_power.description: Perfect the forbidden arts of blood magic, increasing blood spell power by 7%. The very essence of life bends to your will with horrifying efficiency.

minor_evocation_spell_power.title: Summoner's Call
minor_evocation_spell_power.description: Learn to issue the simplest commands to summoned entities, increasing evocation spell power by 1%. Your first steps into the art of conjuration.

major_evocation_spell_power.title: Legion Commander
major_evocation_spell_power.description: Command vast armies from beyond the veil, increasing evocation spell power by 7%. Your summoned creatures manifest with terrible strength and unwavering loyalty.

minor_nature_spell_power.title: Seedling Growth
minor_nature_spell_power.description: Form a tentative bond with natural energies, increasing nature spell power by 1%. Plants respond slightly to your magical presence.

major_nature_spell_power.title: Primal Force Archdruid
major_nature_spell_power.description: Become one with the primal forces of nature, increasing nature spell power by 7%. The raw power of growth, decay, and rebirth flows through your spells with tremendous force.

minor_eldritch_spell_power.title: Forbidden Glimpse
minor_eldritch_spell_power.description: Your mind catches the briefest glimpse of otherworldly knowledge, increasing eldritch spell power by 1%. The fabric of reality seems slightly more pliable to your touch.

major_eldritch_spell_power.title: Cosmic Horror Mastery
major_eldritch_spell_power.description: Your mind has fully embraced the incomprehensible, increasing eldritch spell power by 7%. Reality itself writhes and distorts at your merest thought, enhancing your most terrifying spells.

minor_summon_damage.title: Familiar Bond
minor_summon_damage.description: Establish a basic connection with your summoned creatures, increasing their damage by 1%. Your minions respond better to your magical guidance.

major_summon_damage.title: Soul-Bound Legion
major_summon_damage.description: Your summoned creatures are bound to you through unbreakable arcane bonds, increasing their damage by 7%. They manifest with devastating strength and ferocity, tearing through enemies with supernatural power.

pyromancer_specialization.title: Pyromancer's Ascension
pyromancer_specialization.description: Ascend to true pyromantic mastery, gaining 15% fire spell power, 25% fire magic resistance, and 10% additional fire damage. The inferno surrounds you, flows through you, and emanates from your very being as you command the most primal element with terrifying efficiency.

cryomancer_specialization.title: Cryomancer's Winter
cryomancer_specialization.description: Embrace the eternal winter within and become an avatar of frost, gaining 15% ice spell power, 25% ice magic resistance, and 10% additional cold damage. Your icy magic freezes enemies in their tracks as the bitter cold of absolute zero radiates from your enchanted form.

archmage_specialization.title: Archmage's Brilliance
archmage_specialization.description: Achieve the legendary status of Archmage, gaining 10% universal spell power, 150 maximum mana for both casting systems, and 10% cooldown reduction. Your magical prowess is unmatched as you weave spells with effortless precision and overwhelming arcane might.

battlemage_specialization.title: Battlemage's Fury
battlemage_specialization.description: Master the art of blade and spell, gaining 8% spell power, 8% attack damage, 15% faster casting, and 2 hearts of health. Dance through battle wielding both steel and sorcery, a whirlwind of magical and physical devastation.

summoner_specialization.title: Grand Summoner's Legion
summoner_specialization.description: Command an army from beyond the veil, gaining 15% summon damage and power, 10% evocation spell power, and 70 maximum mana. Your summoned creatures manifest with frightening strength and unquestioning loyalty as you open wider gateways to otherworldly realms.

void_mage_specialization.title: Void Sovereign's Dominion
void_mage_specialization.description: Achieve mastery over the void between dimensions, gaining 15% ender spell power, 15% eldritch spell power, and 30% phase ability. Reality warps around you as you channel cosmic forces from beyond comprehension, allowing partial passage through solid matter itself.

mana_sage_specialization.title: Mana Sage's Infinite Well
mana_sage_specialization.description: Become a living conduit of magical energy, gaining 200 maximum mana, 25 mana regeneration, and 10% mana discount for Ars spells. Arcane energy flows through you in limitless abundance, making your spell reserves seemingly bottomless and your casting nearly effortless.

guardian_mage_specialization.title: Arcane Guardian's Bulwark
guardian_mage_specialization.description: Become an impenetrable ward against magical harm, gaining 20 magic protection, 15% spell resistance, 5 hearts of health, and 10 ghost health. Magical attacks barely scratch your reinforced arcane defenses as your body and soul are shielded by layers of mystical protection.

divine_channeler_specialization.title: Divine Channeler's Blessing
divine_channeler_specialization.description: Open your soul to divine energies, gaining 20% holy spell power, 25% increased healing received, and 10% overheal capacity. Celestial energies flow through you, enhancing your healing abilities and allowing your vitality to temporarily exceed normal limits.
